item.title: Refactoring in Ruby: Smelly Parameters Lists
item.description: Ruby is a really clear and expressive language, but we developers sure know how to make a mess. Even when you think your classes are nicely written and tested, things can still get out of hand. I am pretty sure you’ve heard one (or more) of your more experienced colleagues/mentors tell you that “something is smelly” in the code. Well, in this article we will cover one of the simplest code smells
